A single girl......was crying in a desolate, quiet chapel.
She was a small girl. ......Only six years old.
The girl who would, for twelve years starting now, lament the fact that she wasn't on the island on October 4th and 5th, 1986......
Then, .........a man appeared......
The man noticed the girl, ......walked up to her quietly, trying not to scare her, ......and put an arm gently around her shoulder......

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Umineko Project (UP): "I've been looking for you, Ange......"
The girl jumped into her big brother's chest and started crying again...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Umineko Project (UP): "What's wrong? ......Why are you so sad?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Umineko Project (UP): "Today, a kid in class bullied me...... He said the people on TV were saying Mom had ties to bad people. .........So, he said that Mom and Dad were the culprits, and that they probably killed everyone...... ......I asked Auntie Eva, hoping she'd say it wasn't true, but she didn't say anything...... ......Mom and Dad aren't bad people, are they? Are they...?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Umineko Project (UP): "Poor thing...... ......Everyone says whatever they please about what might have happened on that island on that day... ......Sit over here."
When the man pointed to the floor, a group of gold butterflies gathered there and created a chair.
The girl obediently sat down on it......

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Umineko Project (UP): "......You know, don't you, Onii‐chan? You know that Mom and Dad aren't bad people, right?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Umineko Project (UP): "Yeah. Of course I know that. ......I know that none of them were bad people."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Umineko Project (UP): "Then tell me. What happened that day? What happened on Rokkenjima?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Umineko Project (UP): "Okay. .........I'll tell you. This is what happened on that day."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Umineko Project (UP): "Is it......a scary story...?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Umineko Project (UP): "Come now."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Umineko Project (UP): "Is it a sad story......?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Umineko Project (UP): "Of course not."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Umineko Project (UP): "Then, ......what kind of story is it......?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Umineko Project (UP): "You can decide that for yourself when you hear it. It isn't a painful story at all. So listen up."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Umineko Project (UP): "Okay, Battler onii‐chan......"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
